sqlMap.select:
SELECT PIN , KOREAN_NM , CHCRT_NM , CHCRT_NM2 , ENG_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BRTHDY,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BRTHDY , HOUSE_TEL_NO , MOBL_PHON_NO , MAIN_EMAIL , SUB_EMAIL , EMAIL_SNDNG_YN , SMS_SNDNG_YN , POST_SNDNG_YN , REG_FLAG
FROM MBER_INDVDLINFO WHERE PIN = #pin#

SELECT ZIP_CD , RD_ADRES , RD_ADRES_DETAIL , LEGAL_CD , TRIM(TRIM(RD_ADRES)||' '||TRIM(RD_ADRES_DETAIL)) AS SUM_RD_ADRES , BULD_NM , BULD_NO
FROM ADRES_INFO WHERE ADR_CL = #adrCl# AND ADR_TRG_CL = #trgCl# AND ADR_TRG_ID = #pin#

SELECT OFC_TEL_NO , OFC_FAX_NO , OFICE_NM , SECTION_NM , DEPT_NM , RSP_OFC , TRIM(TRIM(SECTION_NM)||' '||TRIM(DEPT_NM)||' '||TRIM(RSP_OFC)) AS SUM_SECTION_NM
FROM OFICE_INFO WHERE OFC_CL = #trgCl# AND OFC_TRG_ID = #pin#

SELECT ACDMCR_SN , SCHUL_CL , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA2230' AND cc.CD = SCHUL_CL) AS SCHUL_CL_NM , DEGREE , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA9030' AND cc.CD = DEGREE) AS DEGREE_NM , SCHUL_NM , MAJOR , CASE WHEN DEGREE = 'A9030060' THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(GRDTN_YEAR,'YYYYMM'), 'YYYY-MM') ELSE GRDTN_YEAR END AS GRDTN_YEAR
FROM MBER_ACDMCR WHERE PIN = #pin# AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA2230' AND cc.CD = SCHUL_CL) ASC, GRDTN_YEAR ASC
SELECT mp.PTG_SN, mp.PTG_TRG_ID, mp.PHOTO, mp.LAST_YN FROM MBER_PHOTO mp WHERE mp.LAST_YN = 'N' AND mp.PTG_TRG_ID = #pin#

SELECT ac.APP_CPA_NO , ac.PIN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ac.APP_REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APP_REGIST_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE((SELECT acev.APP_END_DE FROM kipadm.apntc_cpa_end1_view acev WHERE acev.APP_CPA_NO=ac.APP_CPA_NO),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APP_REGIST_END_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ac.APP_END_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APP_END_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ac.AUD_REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AUD_REGIST_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE((SELECT acev.AUD_END_DE FROM kipadm.apntc_cpa_end2_view acev WHERE acev.APP_CPA_NO=ac.APP_CPA_NO),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AUD_REGIST_END_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ac.AUD_END_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AUD_END_DE , ac.APNTC_CL , (SELECT TRIM(cc.CD_NM) FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA1010' AND cc.CD = ac.APNTC_CL) AS APNTC_CL_NM , ac.APP_INSTT_CD , (SELECT ai.KOR_AUD_NM FROM AUDIT_INFO ai WHERE ai.AUDIT_CD=ac.APP_INSTT_CD) AS APP_INSTT_CD_NM , ac.APP_INSTT_ETC , ac.APP_INSTT_ETC_YN , ac.GUIDE_CPA_SN , (SELECT mi.KOREAN_NM FROM MBER_INDVDLINFO mi WHERE mi.PIN = (SELECT c.PIN FROM CPA c WHERE c.CPA_ID = ac.GUIDE_CPA_SN)) AS GUIDE_CPA_NM , ac.REMARK , ac.MEMO , (SELECT MAX(ach.OPETR_DE) FROM APNTC_CPA_HIST ach WHERE ach.APP_CPA_NO=ac.APP_CPA_NO AND ach.PIN=ac.PIN AND ach.DELETE_YN ='N') AS LAST_REGIST_DE FROM APNTC_CPA ac WHERE ac.APP_CPA_NO = (SELECT MAX(ac2.APP_CPA_NO) FROM APNTC_CPA ac2 WHERE ac2.PIN = #pin# AND ac2.DELETE_YN = 'N')

SELECT BRF_YEAR, CASE WHEN m1 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT1, CASE WHEN m2 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT2, CASE WHEN m3 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT3, CASE WHEN m4 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT4, CASE WHEN m5 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT5, CASE WHEN m6 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT6, CASE WHEN m7 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT7, CASE WHEN m8 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT8, CASE WHEN m9 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT9, CASE WHEN m10 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT10, CASE WHEN m11 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT11, CASE WHEN m12 > 0 THEN 'check' ELSE 'off' END BRF_MT12 FROM ( SELECT APP_CPA_NO, BRF_YEAR, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 1, 1, 0)) m1, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 2, 1, 0)) m2, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 3, 1, 0)) m3, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 4, 1, 0)) m4, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 5, 1, 0)) m5, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 6, 1, 0)) m6, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 7, 1, 0)) m7, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 8, 1, 0)) m8, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 9, 1, 0)) m9, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 10, 1, 0)) m10, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 11, 1, 0)) m11, SUM (DECODE (BRF_MT, 12, 1, 0)) m12 FROM APNTC_BRF WHERE APP_CPA_NO = #appCpaNo# GROUP BY APP_CPA_NO, BRF_YEAR ORDER BY BRF_YEAR DESC)

SELECT atr.APP_TRN_SN , atr.APP_CPA_NO , atr.PIN , atr.TRN_CL , decode(trn_cl,'1','기본실무','2','외감실무','3','재학생연수') as TRN_CL_NM , atr.TRN_ODR , atr.COMPL_YN , atr.PSEXAM_YN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(atr.TRN_BGN_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRN_BGN_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(atr.TRN_END_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRN_END_DE , atr.TRN_TM , atr.ATEND_TM , atr.ATEND_SCORE , atr.PRCAFS_ABILITY_SCORE , atr.VOC_ETHICS_SCORE , atr.ENTRPRS_ACCNUT_SCORE , atr.ACCNUT_AUDIT_SCORE , atr.TAXLAW_SCORE , atr.MNGMT_EVL_SCORE , atr.ETC1_SCORE , atr.ETC2_SCORE , atr.COMPL_SBJECT_CO , atr.TOT_SCORE , atr.AVRG_SCORE FROM APNTC_TRNNG_RESULT atr WHERE atr.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND atr.APP_CPA_NO = #appCpaNo# AND (atr.TRN_CL = '1' OR atr.TRN_CL = '2') AND atr.FINAL_YN = 'Y'
AND atr.COMPL_YN != #complYn#
ORDER BY atr.APP_TRN_SN ASC

SELECT c.CPA_SN , c.PIN , mi.KOREAN_NM , c.CPA_CL , c.CPA_ID , c.OPETR_DE , c.REGIST_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INTG_REGIST_DE , c.LAST_REGIST_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LAST_REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INTG_LAST_REGIST_DE , c.MBER_FLAG , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA2020' AND cc.CD = c.MBER_FLAG) AS MBER_FLAG_NM , c.AUDIT_ID , (SELECT cch.AUDIT_NM FROM CPA_CAREER_HIST cch WHERE cch.CAREER_SN = (SELECT MAX(CAREER_SN) FROM CPA_CAREER_HIST WHERE DELETE_YN='N' AND CPA_SN = c.CPA_SN)) AS AUDIT_NM , c.AUDIT_OFCPS , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA3020' AND cc.CD = c.AUDIT_OFCPS) AS AUDIT_OFCPS_NM , c.CANCL_CL , c.CLOSED_CL , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD IN ('GA2170','GA2171', 'GA2179') AND cc.CD = c.CLOSED_CL) AS CLOSED_CL_NM , c.RSNDQF_END_DE , c.REMARK , c.MEMO , c.EXTRL_AUD_CL , c.EXTRL_AUD_DE , c.BIZR_NO , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(c.LAST_REGIST_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), + 60),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_REGIST_DE , (SELECT ao.TEL_NO1 FROM AUDIT_OFFICE ao WHERE ao.AUDIT_ID = c.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_TEL_NO , (SELECT ao.FAX_NO FROM AUDIT_OFFICE ao WHERE ao.AUDIT_ID = c.AUDIT_ID) AS AUDIT_FAX_NO , (SELECT ch.CLOSED_CL FROM CPA_HIST ch WHERE ch.CPA_HIST_SN = (SELECT MAX(CPA_HIST_SN) FROM CPA_HIST WHERE CPA_SN = c.CPA_SN)) AS OLD_CLOSED_CL , (SELECT am.MBER_FLAG FROM AID_MASTER am WHERE am.PIN = c.PIN) AS MBER_FLAG , CASE WHEN (SELECT am.MBER_FLAG FROM AID_MASTER am WHERE am.PIN = c.PIN) = 'R' THEN '정회원' ELSE '준회원' END AS AID_MBER_FLAG_NM , (SELECT AUD_GRP_CL FROM AUDIT_INFO ai WHERE ai.AUDIT_CD = (SELECT ao.AUDIT_CD FROM AUDIT_OFFICE ao WHERE ao.AUDIT_ID = c.AUDIT_ID)) AS AUD_GRP_CL
FROM CPA c LEFT JOIN MBER_INDVDLINFO mi ON mi.PIN = c.PIN WHERE c.CPA_SN = (SELECT MAX(CPA_SN) FROM CPA WHERE PIN = #pin#)

select IMM_VNUM
from sdb_int_mb_master@kicpasec
where imm_di = #di#

SELECT c.CPA_SN , c.PIN , mi.KOREAN_NM , c.CPA_CL , c.CPA_ID
FROM CPA c LEFT JOIN MBER_INDVDLINFO mi ON mi.PIN = c.PIN WHERE c.CPA_ID = #cpaId# AND mi.KOREAN_NM = #koreanNm#

SELECT lqm.PIN , lqm.SEQ , lqm.LNDCTN_SBSCRB , lqm.QUALF_REQST_YN , lqm.CRQFC_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(lqm.CRQFC_ISUE_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CRQFC_ISUE_DE , lqm.REGIST_REQST_YN , lqm.LNDCTN_CL , lqm.LNDCTN_NO , lqm.VRIFY_NO , lqm.LNDCTN_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(lqm.REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DE , lqm.UPDT_REQST_YN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(lqm.UPDT_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_DE , lqm.RM , lqm.OPBIZ_DE , lqm.OPBIZ_CL , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA4010' AND cc.CD = lqm.OPBIZ_CL) AS OPBIZ_CL_NM , CASE WHEN lqm.LNDCTN_CL || lqm.LNDCTN_NO || lqm.VRIFY_NO IS NOT NULL THEN lqm.LNDCTN_CL || '-' || CASE WHEN length(lqm.LNDCTN_NO) <5 THEN LPAD(LNDCTN_NO, 4, '0') ELSE substr(lqm.LNDCTN_NO,2,5) END || '-' || lqm.VRIFY_NO ELSE NULL END AS LNDCTN_VRIFY_NO_CL , CASE WHEN lqm.UPDT_DE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(lqm.UPDT_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '5' YEAR) - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN lqm.REGIST_DE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(lqm.REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '5' YEAR) - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE NULL END AS LAST_UPDT_DE
FROM LNDCTN_QUALF_MANAGE lqm WHERE lqm.PIN = #pin# AND lqm.SEQ = (SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM LNDCTN_QUALF_MANAGE WHERE PIN = #pin#)

SELECT tm.PIN , tm.SEQ , tm.LNDCTN_SBSCRB , tl.CRQFC_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tl.CRQFC_ISUE_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CRQFC_ISUE_DE , tm.LNDCTN_CL , tm.LNDCTN_NO , tm.VRIFY_NO , tm.LNDCTN_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tm.REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tm.LAST_REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_DE , tm.REMARK AS RM , tm.OPBIZ_CL , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA4010' AND cc.CD = tm.OPBIZ_CL) AS OPBIZ_CL_NM , CASE WHEN tm.LNDCTN_CL || tm.LNDCTN_NO || tm.VRIFY_NO IS NOT NULL THEN tm.LNDCTN_CL || '-' || CASE WHEN length(tm.LNDCTN_NO) <5 THEN LPAD(LNDCTN_NO, 4, '0') ELSE substr(tm.LNDCTN_NO,2,5) END || '-' || tm.VRIFY_NO ELSE NULL END AS LNDCTN_VRIFY_NO_CL , CASE WHEN tm.LAST_REGIST_DE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tm.LAST_REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '5' YEAR) - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN tm.REGIST_DE IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tm.REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '5' YEAR) - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE NULL END AS LAST_UPDT_DE
FROM TAX_MASTER tm LEFT JOIN TAX_LICENSE tl ON tl.PIN = tm.PIN WHERE tm.PIN = #pin# AND tm.SEQ = (SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM TAX_MASTER WHERE PIN = #pin#)

SELECT acm.APNTC_SN , acm.PIN , acm.AGREE_INFO1_YN , acm.AGREE_INFO2_YN , acm.AGREE_INFO3_YN , acm.PHOTO_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(acm.VACATION_STR_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VACATION_STR_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(acm.VACATION_END_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VACATION_END_DE , acm.GRDT_SATAUS , CASE WHEN acm.GRDT_SATAUS = '00000010' THEN '졸업 또는 미재학' ELSE '재학중' END AS GRDT_SATAUS_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(acm.GRDT_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GRDT_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(acm.APP_REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APP_REGIST_DE , acm.GUIDE_CPA_NM , acm.GUIDE_CPA_NO , acm.APP_INSTT_NM , acm.APP_INSTT_CD , acm.APP_INSTT_ETC , acm.APNTC_CL , (SELECT AUD_GRP_CL FROM AUDIT_INFO WHERE AUDIT_CD = acm.APP_INSTT_CD) AS STAUS_CL , acm.ATCH_FILE_ID1 , acm.ATCH_FILE_ID2 , acm.ATCH_FILE_ID3 , acm.ATCH_FILE_ID4 , acm.PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID , acm.EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE acm.ATCH_FILE_ID1 =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID1_NM , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE acm.ATCH_FILE_ID2 =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID2_NM , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE acm.ATCH_FILE_ID3 =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID3_NM , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE acm.ATCH_FILE_ID4 =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID4_NM , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE acm.PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID_NM , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE acm.EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID_NM , acm.RSUM_FILE_NM , acm.EVENTN , acm.REG_FLAG , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(acm.OPETR_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPETR_DE , TO_CHAR(acm.FRST_REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FRST_REGIST_DT , acm.REJECT_RSN , acm.REMARK
FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP acm WHERE acm.APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin#)
AND REG_FLAG = #regFlag#

SELECT PIN , AGREE_INFO1_YN , AGREE_INFO2_YN , AGREE_INFO3_YN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AUD_REGIST_DE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AUD_REGIST_DE , GUIDE_CPA_NM , GUIDE_CPA_NO , APP_INSTT_NM , APP_INSTT_CD , APP_INSTT_ETC , APNTC_CL , (SELECT AUD_GRP_CL FROM AUDIT_INFO WHERE AUDIT_CD = aacm.APP_INSTT_CD) AS STAUS_CL , EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID , ATCH_FILE_ID , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID_NM , RSUM_FILE_NM , CASE WHEN aacm.ATCH_FILE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE aacm.ATCH_FILE_ID =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) ELSE '' END AS ATCH_FILE_ID_NM , REG_FLAG , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(OPETR_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPETR_DE , TO_CHAR(aacm.FRST_REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FRST_REGIST_DT , REJECT_RSN , REMARK , EVENTN
FROM APNTC_AUD_CPA_MYP aacm WHERE aacm.APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_AUD_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin#)
AND REG_FLAG = #regFlag#

SELECT cm.CPA_SN , cm.PIN , cm.KOREAN_NM , cm.AGREE_INFO1_YN , cm.AGREE_INFO2_YN , cm.AID_MBER_FLAG , CASE WHEN cm.AID_MBER_FLAG = 'R' THEN '정회원' ELSE '준회원' END AS AID_MBER_FLAG_NM , cm.BIZR_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cm.REGIST_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DE , cm.MBER_FLAG , CASE WHEN cm.MBER_FLAG = 'A2020010' THEN '전업' WHEN cm.MBER_FLAG = 'A2020030' THEN '개업' ELSE '휴업' END AS MBER_FLAG_NM , cm.AUDIT_NM , cm.AUDIT_ID , cm.AUDIT_OFCPS , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA3020' AND cc.CD = cm.AUDIT_OFCPS) AS AUDIT_OFCPS_NM , PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID , APNTC_END_FILE_ID , ATCH_FILE_ID , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE cm.PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID_NM , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE cm.APNTC_END_FILE_ID =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS APNTC_END_FILE_ID_NM , (SELECT ld.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL ld WHERE cm.ATCH_FILE_ID =ld.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS ATCH_FILE_ID_NM , cm.RSUM_FILE_NM , cm.EVENTN , cm.CLOSED_CL , cm.CLOSED_CL_NM , cm.REG_FLAG , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cm.OPETR_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPETR_DE , TO_CHAR(cm.FRST_REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FRST_REGIST_DT , REJECT_RSN , REMARK , SBSCRB_MYP_SN , SBSCRB_YN , TRIM(TRIM(adr.RD_ADRES)||' '||TRIM(adr.RD_ADRES_DETAIL)) AS ADRES , to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') AS CURRENT_DE
FROM CPA_MYP cm LEFT JOIN ADRES_INFO adr ON ADR_CL = 'OFICE' AND ADR_TRG_CL = 'AUDOFICE' AND adr.ADR_TRG_ID = cm.AUDIT_ID WHERE cm.CPA_SN = (SELECT MAX(CPA_SN) FROM CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin#)
AND REG_FLAG = #regFlag#

select IMM_VNUM, imm_di
from sdb_int_mb_master@kicpasec
where IMM_VNUM = #pin#
select CD , GRP_CD , CD_NM , SORT , USE_YN , UPPER_CD , OPTN1 , OPTN2 from CMMN_CODE where grp_cd = #grpCd# and use_yn = 'Y'
select cd from CMMN_CODE where grp_cd = 'GN0040' and use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT c.CPA_SN , c.PIN , mi.KOREAN_NM , c.CPA_CL , c.CPA_ID , c.OPETR_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(c.REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(c.LAST_REGIST_DE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LAST_REGIST_DE , c.MBER_FLAG , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA2020' AND cc.CD = c.MBER_FLAG) AS MBER_FLAG_NM , c.AUDIT_ID , (SELECT cch.AUDIT_NM FROM CPA_CAREER_HIST cch WHERE cch.CAREER_SN = (SELECT MAX(CAREER_SN) FROM CPA_CAREER_HIST WHERE DELETE_YN='N' AND CPA_SN = c.CPA_SN)) AS AUDIT_NM , c.AUDIT_OFCPS , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA3020' AND cc.CD = c.AUDIT_OFCPS) AS AUDIT_OFCPS_NM , c.CANCL_CL , c.CLOSED_CL , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD IN ('GA2170','GA2171', 'GA2179') AND cc.CD = c.CLOSED_CL) AS CLOSED_CL_NM , c.RSNDQF_END_DE , c.REMARK , c.MEMO , c.EXTRL_AUD_CL , c.EXTRL_AUD_DE , c.BIZR_NO , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(c.LAST_REGIST_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), + 60),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_REGIST_DE
FROM CPA c LEFT JOIN MBER_INDVDLINFO mi ON mi.PIN = c.PIN WHERE c.CPA_ID = #searchKeyword2# AND mi.KOREAN_NM = #searchKeyword1#
